rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space with minimalistic Scandinavian design featuring neutral colors and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with wooden accents and large windows for ample daylight, incorporating a central courtyard view.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed in a Scandinavian style with clean lines and functional design.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light, oriented per Vastu norms to maximize positive energy.
Designated opening leading to a serene central courtyard with greenery and seating area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with Scandinavian design elements, positioned in the southwest according to Vastu for stability.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Guest room designed with light finishes and functional storage, located east following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Hallway/Corridor
rooms.description: Connects all rooms with a minimalist Scandinavian design aesthetic.

openings.description: Window openings to ensure proper ventilation and natural light, oriented north for clarity.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: Dedicated study space with built-in bookshelves and ergonomic furniture, designed to foster creativity.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Multi-functional entertainment room with soundproofing and comfortable seating arranged in a central layout.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom (optional)
rooms.description: Extra bedroom for extended family members or guests, designed to maintain Scandinavian minimalism.

openings.description: Window openings for ventilation and natural light, placed in accordance with Vastu principles.
Connects the floors ensuring compliance with safety norms and efficient movement.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open space acting as a communal area for relaxation and family gatherings, designed with greenery and water elements per Vastu.

openings.description: Access point from the living room ensuring easy flow of energy and social interaction.
